1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:"The Messenger of Allah was performing prayer, and I was by his side. I was menstruating, and I was wearing a wool cloak, and part of it was over him

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الصَّلاَةِ فِي ثَوْبِ الْحَائِضِ
chapter.eng-name: Performing prayer in the garment of a menstruating woman
